welcome_paragraph: Le module inikeza ulwazi olubalulekile nezinsiza zokusekela impilo kamama nengane. Funda ngezikhathi zokukhulelwa, imithi ephephile, futhi ulandele ukuvakashelwa kwangemva kokubeletha.
resource_intro: Hlola izinto zemfundo ezihlelwe kahle zokusekela omama, imindeni, nabasebenzi bezempilo. Lezi zinsiza zihlanganisa izindatshana, amavidiyo, iziqondiso eziphrintekayo, namathuluzi asebenzisanayo.
symptomsContent: Ukuba isicanucanu, ukukhathala, nokuguquguquka kwemizwa kuvamile ekuqaleni kokukhulelwa.
nutritionContent: Gxila ku-folic acid, ukudla okunensimbi, nokuphuza amanzi amaningi.
wellnessContent: Izinguquko zamahomoni zingathinta imizwa. Ukuphumula, ukubhala phansi, nokukhuluma nomuntu othembele kuye kuyasiza.
exerciseContent: Imisebenzi ethambile njengokuhamba, ukubhukuda, ne-yoga yamasonto okukhulelwa isiza ukujikeleza kwegazi nokunciphisa ingcindezi.
checkupContent: Ukuhlolwa kwe-ultrasound nokuhlolwa koshukela kuvamile kulesi sigaba. Qhubeka nokuvakashela udokotela.
birthPrepContent: Pakisha isikhwama sokuba esibhedlela, hlola izinhlelo zokuzala, futhi uqaphele izimpawu zokubeletha.
emotionalPrepContent: Zijwayeze izindlela zokuphefumula, hamba ezifundweni zokubeletha, futhi uxoxe ngezinhlelo zangemva kokubeletha nomndeni wakho.
finalPrepContent: Qinisekisa uhlelo lwakho lokubeletha nodokotela, hlola oxhumana nabo ezimeni eziphuthumayo, futhi ulungiselele ukwamukelwa esibhedlela.
child_growth_milestones_description: Landela ukukhula komzimba, ukucabanga, nokuziphatha kwengane kusukela ekuzalweni kuya ebusheni.
child_growth_milestones_intro: Qonda izigaba zokukhula kusukela ebuntwaneni kuya ebusheni.
infant_milestones: Ukumamatheka, ukuzungeza, ukuhlala, ukuhamba ngezinzwane, amagama okuqala.
toddler_milestones: Ukuhamba, ukugijima, imisho elula, ukudlala ndawonye.
adolescent_milestones: Izinguquko zobusha, ukucabanga okunzulu, ukwakha ubuwena.
tip_play: Khuthaza ukudlala ukuze kwakhe amakhono omzimba kanye nawokuxhumana.
tip_talk: Khuluma futhi ufunde nengane yakho nsuku zonke.
tip_nutrition: Nikeza ukudla okunempilo ukuze kukhule kahle.
